items: Step 1: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and place the resistance band around your thighs, just above your knees.
Step 2: Hold the ends of the resistance band with your hands and bring them up to shoulder height.
Step 3: Lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and your knees behind your toes.
Step 4: Hold the squat position for a few seconds, then slowly return to the starting position.
Step 5: Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
Targets multiple muscle groups including quadriceps, glutes, hamstrings, and calves
Improves lower body strength and endurance
Can be modified for different fitness levels by adjusting the resistance band tension or using a different type of band
Can be done anywhere with minimal equipment
